Original: 位於內湖民權東路上的水星球酒吧，雖然附近沒有捷運站，但從市區搭車到這裡都很便宜。主要是一間潛水酒吧，老闆很健談，也有在教潛水。空間有室內也有室外，戶外區夜晚搭配的露營燈朋友露營的風格；店內有很多潛水的擺飾還有服飾，有海尼根生啤酒機，也有一個頭螢幕播電影或者比賽，或音樂頻道。整體來說還算寬敞舒適，平常人不多，價位也不貴，是內湖很推薦的酒吧之一。
EN: Located on the East Road of Neihu Minquan Road, although there are no MRT stations nearby, it is cheap to take a ride here.It is mainly a diving bar. The boss is very talkative and taught diving.There are indoor and outdoor, outdoor, and outdoor camping lights camping at night; there are many diving decorations and clothing in the store, Hynite beer machine, and a screen to broadcast movies or competitions, or music channels.On the whole, it is quite spacious and comfortable. There are not many people and the price is not expensive. It is one of the bars recommended by Neihu.
